languages.text: Перед тем, как покинуть системы некронов, Лорд-Инквизитор Калькасар приказал покоренному божеству уничтожить все планеты-гробницы. Так сгинула еще одна угроза Человечеству в этом секторе, как и сокрытые там подсказки о природе чудовища, поставленного на службу Империуму.

Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.
languages.original_text: Перед тем, как покинуть системы некронов, Лорд-Инквизитор Калькасар приказал покоренному божеству уничтожить все планеты-гробницы. Так сгинула еще одна угроза Человечеству в этом секторе, как и сокрытые там подсказки о природе чудовища, поставленного на службу Империуму.

traits.locale_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the clues it held to the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the clues it held to the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

languages.text: Avant de quitter les systèmes nécrons, le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar ordonna à la divinité conquise de détruire tous les mondes-nécropoles. Ainsi s'éteignit une autre menace à la survie de l'humanité dans le secteur, emportant avec elle les secrets de la nature du monstre, désormais au service de l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

traits.locale_text: Avant de quitter les systèmes nécrons, le seigneur inquisiteur Calcazar ordonna à la divinité conquise de détruire tous les mondes-nécropoles. Ainsi s'éteignit une autre menace à la survie de l'humanité dans le secteur, emportant avec elle les secrets de la nature du monstre, désormais au service de l'Imperium.

languages.text: Antes de salir de los sistemas Necrones, el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar ordenó al dios subyugado que destruyera todos los mundos necrópolis. Así, otra amenaza contra la Humanidad fue erradicada en el sector, junto con las pistas que albergaban sobre la naturaleza del monstruo sometido por el Imperium.
languages.original_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

traits.locale_text: Antes de salir de los sistemas Necrones, el Lord Inquisidor Calcazar ordenó al dios subyugado que destruyera todos los mundos necrópolis. Así, otra amenaza contra la Humanidad fue erradicada en el sector, junto con las pistas que albergaban sobre la naturaleza del monstruo sometido por el Imperium.

languages.text: 卡尔卡扎大审判官离开太空死灵的星系前，命令受人类驱使的神明将所有墓穴世界彻底消灭。就这样，科罗努斯扩区又少了一个威胁。然而，那些隐藏的线索也就此彻底消失，帝国失去了认识那些怪物本质的机会。
languages.original_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

traits.locale_text: 卡尔卡扎大审判官离开太空死灵的星系前，命令受人类驱使的神明将所有墓穴世界彻底消灭。就这样，科罗努斯扩区又少了一个威胁。然而，那些隐藏的线索也就此彻底消失，帝国失去了认识那些怪物本质的机会。

languages.text: ネクロンの星系を去る前、カルカザール大審問官は、捕らえた神にすべての墓世界を破壊するよう命じた。こうして、この宙域で人間どもにとっての脅威がまた一つ消え、同時に、墓世界に隠されていた帝国に引き入れられた怪物の正体を示す手がかりも失われた。
languages.original_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

traits.locale_text: ネクロンの星系を去る前、カルカザール大審問官は、捕らえた神にすべての墓世界を破壊するよう命じた。こうして、この宙域で人間どもにとっての脅威がまた一つ消え、同時に、墓世界に隠されていた帝国に引き入れられた怪物の正体を示す手がかりも失われた。

languages.text: Nekron sistemlerinden ayrılmadan önce Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, fethedilen ilaha her bir Kabir Dünyasını yok etmesini emretti. Böylece sektördeki İnsanlığa yönelik bir başka tehdit, İmparatorluk hizmetine sokulan canavarın doğası hakkındaki gizli ipuçlarıyla birlikte yok oldu.
languages.original_text: Before leaving the Necron systems, Lord Inquisitor Calcazar ordered the conquered deity to destroy every Tomb World. Thus perished another threat to Humanity in the sector, along with the hidden clues it held about the nature of the monster brought into the Imperium's service.

traits.locale_text: Nekron sistemlerinden ayrılmadan önce Lord Engizisyoncu Calcazar, fethedilen ilaha her bir Kabir Dünyasını yok etmesini emretti. Böylece sektördeki İnsanlığa yönelik bir başka tehdit, İmparatorluk hizmetine sokulan canavarın doğası hakkındaki gizli ipuçlarıyla birlikte yok oldu.
